introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: At Gulf Universal Property Development ("GUPD", "we", "us", or "our"), we are committed to providing exceptional customer support and service. This Support Policy outlines our commitment to you, our valued customers, and explains how we handle support requests, inquiries, and customer service matters.

sections.heading: 1. Support Hours
sections.content: Our customer support team is available during the following hours:

subsections.title: Business Hours
subsections.content: Sunday - Thursday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (UAE Time). We are closed on Fridays and Saturdays, as well as on official UAE public holidays.

subsections.title: Response Times
subsections.content: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters related to property sales or reservations, we will make every effort to respond as quickly as possible.

sections.heading: 2. Contact Methods
sections.content: You can reach our support team through the following channels:
list: Email: info@gupd.ae
In-Person: Visit our office at Orient building - 2nd Floor - Office 23 Al Arouba St - Al Mareija - Hay Al Gharb - Sharjah, UAE
Website Contact Form: Available on our contact page

sections.heading: 3. Types of Support
sections.content: Our support team can assist you with:
list: Property inquiries and information requests
Scheduling property viewings and site visits
Purchase process questions and guidance
Payment and financing inquiries
Documentation and legal matters related to property transactions
After-sales support and property management queries
Technical support for website and online services
General information about our projects and services

sections.heading: 4. Support Priority Levels
sections.content: We prioritize support requests based on their urgency and nature:

subsections.title: High Priority
subsections.content: Urgent matters related to active property purchases, payment issues, or time-sensitive transactions. These are addressed immediately during business hours.

subsections.title: Medium Priority
subsections.content: Property inquiries, viewing requests, and general information requests. These are typically responded to within 24 hours.

subsections.title: Low Priority
subsections.content: General questions, feedback, or non-urgent inquiries. These are handled within 2-3 business days.

sections.heading: 5. Information Required for Support
sections.content: To help us assist you more effectively, please provide the following information when contacting support:
list: Your full name and contact information
Property or project name (if applicable)
Reference number or transaction ID (if applicable)
Detailed description of your inquiry or issue
Preferred method of communication
Any relevant documentation or screenshots

sections.heading: 6. Property Viewings and Site Visits
sections.content: For property viewings and site visits:

subsections.title: Scheduling
subsections.content: Property viewings can be scheduled through our website contact form, by phone, or by email. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to ensure availability.

subsections.title: Cancellations
subsections.content: If you need to cancel or reschedule a viewing, please notify us at least 12 hours in advance. This helps us accommodate other customers.

subsections.title: Requirements
subsections.content: Visitors may be required to provide identification and sign a visitor registration form for security and safety purposes.

sections.heading: 7. After-Sales Support
sections.content: Our commitment to you doesn't end after your purchase. We provide ongoing support for:
list: Property handover process
Warranty and maintenance inquiries
Documentation and title deed matters
Property management services
Community and facilities information

sections.heading: 8. Escalation Process
sections.content: If you are not satisfied with the support received, you may escalate your concern:

subsections.title: Level 1
subsections.content: Contact our Customer Support Manager at info@gupd.ae with "Escalation" in the subject line.

subsections.title: Level 2
subsections.content: For serious concerns, you may request to speak with senior management by contacting our main office.

subsections.title: Legal Disputes
subsections.content: For legal disputes, please refer to our Terms and Conditions for dispute resolution procedures.

sections.heading: 9. Feedback and Complaints
sections.content: We welcome your feedback and take all complaints seriously. Please contact us at info@gupd.ae with "Feedback" or "Complaint" in the subject line. We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours and work to resolve your concerns promptly.

sections.heading: 10. Confidentiality
sections.content: All information shared with our support team is treated with strict confidentiality in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

sections.heading: 11. Limitations
sections.content: While we strive to provide the best possible support, please note:
list: Support is provided during business hours only
We cannot provide legal or financial advice beyond property-related matters
Some requests may require consultation with third-party service providers
Response times may be extended during peak periods or holidays

sections.heading: 12. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Support Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
